participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys helping others and staying active.
participant_1.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i'm a professional wrestler. i like to workout a times a week. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and disciplined, passionate about sports and fitness.
participant_2.background: my favorite color is yellow. i love italian food and garlic bread. i am a gold medalist olympian. gymnastics is my favorite sport. i workout four hours a day.

content.text: Hi ! How is your day going ?
Would you let me know about you ?
